overview: Formats was made out of a desire to produce a full-length wakeboard film that the core rider can appreciate while the general public can admire cinematically. The concept for Formats is to incorporate modern technology with classic ingenuity and film composition, creating a timeless movie. The video will feature some of the worlds most unique and talented riders in every aspect of wakeboarding. Filmed in over a year’s time across three continents, the project will incorporate several different film mediums that correlate to each of the riders highly anticipated sections. Formats features progressive boat and cable riding alongside the most extensive, creative, and technical winch section’s to date.
tagline: With five of the industry’s most talented and unique wakeboarders, Formats features progressive boat and cable riding, alongside the most creative, extensive, and technical winching to date.
title: Formats
